alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Knox; Pierce; Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 2:18AM CDT until July 24 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Wayne County in northeastern Nebraska... Northeastern Pierce County in northeastern Nebraska... Southeastern Knox County in northeastern Nebraska... Southwestern Cedar County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 217 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northwest of Osmond, or 25 miles northeast of Neligh, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Randolph and Carroll. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
